diff_act: 3.generate a related list of project information

regen.absent_element: validation of project ID before displaying the project information
regen.new_specification: The system shall validate the project ID before displaying the related project information to ensure that the ID exists in the database and is associated with a valid project.

regen.absent_element: verification of user input for project ID and map selection
regen.new_specification: The system shall verify the user input for project ID and map selection to ensure it matches existing projects in the database before generating the related list.

regen.absent_element: validation of project ID before querying the database
regen.new_specification: The system shall validate the project ID entered by the user before running a query against the projects in the database.

label: SQL errors will be reported to the user for correction.
